alert.note: Alert for Grant; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 05 at 3:17PM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Grant and McPherson Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
